mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.dic_name as asn_status_dic, c.dic_name as asn_type_dic, d.dic_name as source_doc_type_dic, e.supplier_name, e.supplier_code FROM wms_erp_asn_head a LEFT JOIN wms_dic_list b on a.asn_status = b.dic_id LEFT JOIN wms_dic_list c on a.asn_type = c.dic_id LEFT JOIN wms_dic_list d on a.source_doc_type = d.dic_id LEFT JOIN wms_supplier e on a.supplier_id = e.supplier_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
